sentences.en: “Many status games seem designed to put down others”(&b{Alvin F. Poussaint})
sentences.cn: “许多权位竞争好象是为战胜别人而设计的”(&b{阿尔文F.普森特})

sentences.en: A changing world has put pressures on the company.
sentences.cn: 日新月异的世界使这家公司感到了压力。

sentences.en: At least put forth a semblance of effort when you scrub the floor.
sentences.cn: 当你擦地板时至少能表现出努力的样子

sentences.en: Barry had his nose put out of joint by Lucy's aloof sophistication.
sentences.cn: 露西的冷淡与世故使得巴里十分不快。

sentences.en: Did our early arrival put you out?
sentences.cn: 我们提早到达是不是使您很不方便?

sentences.en: He crossed out "Screenplay" and put "Written by" instead.
sentences.cn: 他划掉了“编剧”二字，改为“作者”。

sentences.en: He put in a good word for me.
sentences.cn: 他插进来为我说了一句好话

sentences.en: He put me through a lot of trouble.
sentences.cn: 他使我遇到许多麻烦

sentences.en: He put the case to the Saudi Foreign Minister.
sentences.cn: 他把这起事件向沙特外长作了说明。

sentences.en: He put the coffee on the table.
sentences.cn: 他把咖啡放在桌上。

sentences.en: He tried to put down her knowledge of literature.
sentences.cn: 他试图贬低她的文学知识

sentences.en: He’s not very musical, to put it mildly (= he’s not musical at all ) .
sentences.cn: 说得婉转点，他不是很有音乐天赋。

sentences.en: Her bed was crisply made, her clothes put away.
sentences.cn: 她的床收拾得很整洁，衣服也收起来了。

sentences.en: Her parents put her down for failing the course.
sentences.cn: 她的父母因为她考试不及格而批评她

sentences.en: His indifferent attitude has put us off.
sentences.cn: 他的冷淡态度使我们对他很反感

sentences.en: I was put out by his attention to the television set.
sentences.cn: 我被他对电视节目的关注激怒了

sentences.en: In a few words she had put him in his place.
sentences.cn: 她简单几句话就杀了他的威风。

sentences.en: It is hard to put into words (= express ) how I feel now.
sentences.cn: 我现在的感觉难以用语言描述。

sentences.en: It’s fairly risky. Or to put it another way (= say it in different words ) , don’t try this at home.
sentences.cn: 这样相当危险，或者换句话说，别试着在家里干。

sentences.en: Just put him down as a sneak.
sentences.cn: 他被归入鬼鬼祟祟的那一类人

sentences.en: Let's put this disaster down to experience.
sentences.cn: 让我们把这次灾难归因于经验不足

sentences.en: managed to put off the creditors for another week.
sentences.cn: 设法说服债主晚一个星期再来

sentences.en: My grandmother puts by her fresh vegetables.
sentences.cn: 我的祖母把她的新鲜蔬菜搁在一边存下来

sentences.en: Plants put forth new growth in the spring.
sentences.cn: 植物在春天里开始新的生长

sentences.en: Put a pan of salted water on to boil.
sentences.cn: 将一锅盐水放上去煮。

sentences.en: put all negative thoughts away.
sentences.cn: 抛弃所有消极的思想

sentences.en: put away the dinner in just a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 就在几分钟内吃光了晚餐

sentences.en: Put away the tools after work, will you?
sentences.cn: 工作结束后请把工具收拾好。

sentences.en: put down a rebellion.
sentences.cn: 镇压了一起暴乱

sentences.en: put down rumors.
sentences.cn: 制止流言

sentences.en: put forth an idea.
sentences.cn: 提出一个想法

sentences.en: put forward a new plan.
sentences.cn: 提出一个新计划

sentences.en: put in a plea of guilty.
sentences.cn: 正式提出犯罪诉讼

sentences.en: put off a sweater.
sentences.cn: 脱下毛衣

sentences.en: put off paying the bills.
sentences.cn: 拖延付清帐单

sentences.en: put on a coat; put socks on.
sentences.cn: 穿上外衣；穿上袜子

sentences.en: put on a variety show.
sentences.cn: 举行一次杂耍演出

sentences.en: put on an English accent.
sentences.cn: 假装带有英国口音

sentences.en: put on the brakes.
sentences.cn: 刹闸

sentences.en: put on weight.
sentences.cn: 增加体重

sentences.en: put out a drunk.
sentences.cn: 赶走醉汉

sentences.en: put out a fire.
sentences.cn: 扑灭一场大火

sentences.en: put out a weekly newsletter.
sentences.cn: 发行时事周刊

sentences.en: Put the onions in the pan and cook until lightly browned.
sentences.cn: 将洋葱放入平底锅内，炒至略呈棕色。

sentences.en: put the project through on time; put through a number of new laws.
sentences.cn: 按时完成了项目；通过许多新法律

sentences.en: puts down three big meals a day.
sentences.cn: 一天吃掉三顿大餐

sentences.en: Rationing had put an end to a surfeit of biscuits long ago.
sentences.cn: 定量供应很久以前就结束了饼干过剩的状况。

sentences.en: She was so ill that she was put on a respirator.
sentences.cn: 她病得很严重，被戴上了人工呼吸器。

sentences.en: So it was an accident, an ‘act of God’ if you want to put it like that .
sentences.cn: 那么这是个意外，是 上帝的作为”，如果你想那么说的话。

sentences.en: The company put on a play about the homeless.
sentences.cn: 这家剧团上演了一出讲述无家可归者的戏。

sentences.en: The freighter puts in at noon.
sentences.cn: 货轮中午时进入港口

sentences.en: The injured cat was put away.
sentences.cn: 这个受伤的猫被杀死了

sentences.en: The inmate had put in six years at hard labor. She put in eight hours behind a desk.
sentences.cn: 犯人已经做了六年的苦工。她在花了八小时办公

sentences.en: The operator put me through on the office line.
sentences.cn: 接线生给我接通了办公室的电话

sentences.en: The subject matter makes the painting a little, how shall I put it (= how can I say it politely? ) , undesirable for public display.
sentences.cn: 这个主题让这幅画有点，怎么说呢，不适合公开展览。

sentences.en: The teacher training college put up a plaque to the college's founder.
sentences.cn: 那所教师培训学院为该学院的创立者立了一块纪念牌匾。

sentences.en: They had asked Hong Kong for permission to put into port there.
sentences.cn: 他们请求香港允许他们在那里入港停留。

sentences.en: They had put a padlock on the door of his flat.
sentences.cn: 他们已经在他的公寓门上上了把挂锁。

sentences.en: This put me in mind of some-thing Patrick said many years ago.
sentences.cn: 这使我想起多年前帕特里克曾说过的话。

sentences.en: tried to put a lie over, but to no avail.
sentences.cn: 试图用谎言瞒过去，但没有成功

sentences.en: tried to put her views across during the hearing.
sentences.cn: 在听讼过程中试图使她的观点能被清楚地理解

sentences.en: We get on each other’s nerves, to put it bluntly (= to say exactly what I mean ) .
sentences.cn: 我们俩都让对方烦，坦白地说。

sentences.en: We put in 20 rows of pine trees.
sentences.cn: 我们种植了20排松树

sentences.en: When women joined the organization, it ‘took on a new look,’ as news reports put it .
sentences.cn: 女性加入以后，就如新闻报道中所说，那个机构“面貌焕然一新”。

sentences.en: Where did you put the programmes?
sentences.cn: 你把节目单放在哪里了？

sentences.en: You're putting me on!
sentences.cn: 你在开我的玩笑

words.tran_cn: 推棒；置放者；新进的矿工
投掷；（高尔夫球）打球入洞
放置（put的ing形式）；轻击球；使球入洞的轻击（putt的ing形式）
闲荡；行为懒散（过去式puttered，过去分词puttered，现在分词puttering，第三人称单数putters，名词putterer）

phrases.tran_cn: 使…转向：改变方向或使…改变方向；从一个航向转到另一个航向或使从一个航向转到另一个航向
搞成：用欺骗或计谋完成或贯彻
储存…备用：节约以供后来的使用
吃光，喝光：很容易地吃光或喝光（食物或饮料）；吃光
&I{【航海】} 进港：进入口岸或港口
到位；落实到位；正在实施
使进入；把...放进；在……上种植
夸张；要高价；[俚]装腔作势
&I{【粗俗用语】} &I{【俚语】} 性生活上频繁，尤其用于妇女
做成：使承认，尤其是为了欺骗时
提供；建造；举起；推举，提名；供给…住宿

trans.tran_cn: 放置，把…送往，安置于，使处于…，给予，把…视为，表达，使感觉到，推铅球，使接受，寄托于，投入，写上
trans.tran_en: to move something to a particular place or position, especially using your hands
to move something to a particular place or position, especially using your hands
